name: Rafting And Zipline Cusco
description: The adventure starts at 1:30 minutes drive by the road Cusco-Sichuan. The tour will take place in auto evacuants inflatable rafts for an average of two hours with rivers level 3; Completing the activity you can relax in a sauna and enjoy a delicious picnic lunch. After a break the guides will provide you all the necessary information and safety measures for the activity of the zip line about 110m long; An awesome full day.
